long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Help the stickman surf to the finish line in this addicting homage to Line Rider! Just like the original hit game Line Rider, construct lines for the stickman to surf on. Avoid letting the stickman touch the ground or you will have to start over. Watch out for airborne hazards! Complete each level by reaching the finish line!

Stickman Surfer is an online arcade game that we hand picked for drunk-game.com. This is one of our favorite mobile arcade games that we have to play. Simply click the big play button to start having fun. If you want more titles like this, then check out Ragdoll Tennis or Sticker Maker. To play even more free games, view our all time top games page.

*Note: We have added external game links for more "Unblocked Games", making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://monkeymart.org
long.en_AU,en_US,vi:
Stickman Surfer Unblocked Game is an exciting and fast-paced surfing game available as a Chrome extension. Join the adventurous stickman as he rides the waves and performs epic stunts on his surfboard. Navigate through challenging obstacles, collect coins, and ride the biggest waves to achieve high scores. With its minimalist stickman graphics, smooth controls, and addictive gameplay, "Stickman Surfer" delivers an adrenaline-pumping experience. The Chrome extension provides easy access, allowing you to enjoy the game directly in your browser. Plus, it's unblocked and free to play on the monkeymart.org website, ensuring that you can catch the waves and ride the thrill without any limitations. Get ready to hang ten and become the ultimate stickman surfer in "Stickman Surfer Unblocked Game"!
